markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8+"
    pfs=""
>
[Energy-Resistant](/Equipment.aspx?ID=283)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 582 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These symbols convey protective forces from the Elemental Planes. You gain resistance 5 to acid, cold, electricity, or fire. The crafter chooses the damage type when creating the rune. Multiple _energy-resistant_ runes can be etched onto a suit of armor; rather than using only the highest-level effect, each must provide resistance to a different damage type. For instance, a _+2 acid-resistant greater fire-resistant breastplate_ would give you acid resistance 5 and fire resistance 10.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 8"
pfs="Standard"
>
Energy-Resistant
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 582 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 420 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 12"
pfs="Standard"
>
Energy-Resistant (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 582 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 1,650 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You gain resistance 10 to the specified damage type.
name: Energy-Resistant
